titleStmt.title: A hopefull way to cure that horrid sinne of swearing, or, An help to save swearers if willing to be saved being an offer or message from him whom they so daringly and audaciously provoke : also a curb against cursing.
titleStmt.author: Younge, Richard.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to R. Younge--National union catalog pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
